name: Racing & Kill Zombies On The Highway
name_original: Racing & Kill Zombies On The Highway
description:
[Racing & Kill Zombies On The Highway] will keep you racing on that highway more times than you’re willing to admit.

Racing & Kill Zombies On The Highway a sublime blend of ease, skill, violence.

..this game oozes fun.

..running from hordes of zombies is just so much fun... effortlessly recommended.

We had a very hard time putting this one down to write the review

Why aren't you playing yet? Join 10 million people from around the world!
